February ll# 1944
Mr. t* Keith tyler
Institute rcR Education by Radio
Ohio State University
Columbus If), Ohio
Dear Keith:
Thanks for your Letter of February Sth regarding
the Fifteenth Institute for Education by Radio.
I AM SURE THAT THE N.A.E.B. GROUP * ILL W ISH TO
HOLD SOME KIND OF A SPECIAL MEETING IN CONNECTION WtTH
the Institute. Regarding the exact day and kind of
MEETING* I AM ASKING FOR THE ADVICE OF THE OFFICERS
AND EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE. l#LL LET Y'U KNOW LATER.
What is scheduled for Sunday?
Cordially,
FE3:maj
Frank E. Schoolsy
Program 0$rector
